availableGrants.title: Available Funding Programs
availableGrants.description: We specialize in helping businesses access these key funding opportunities for digital transformation and innovation projects.
availableGrants.noResults: No grants found matching your criteria.

cir.title: Research Tax Credit (CIR)
cir.description: A tax incentive allowing companies to benefit from a tax credit on research and development (R&D) expenses. It can cover up to 30% of eligible expenses, representing significant financial support for your innovative projects.
cir.eligibility: All companies with eligible R&D expenses

bpifrance.title: Bpifrance Support
bpifrance.description: Bpifrance offers a variety of financing and support for companies of all sizes, including innovation loans to finance innovative projects at all stages of development, and innovation grants and repayable advances for research, development and innovation projects.

fsn.title: Digital Society Fund (FSN)
fsn.description: The FSN finances projects aimed at developing digital infrastructure and innovative digital services. Companies can obtain grants or loans for projects meeting these criteria.
fsn.eligibility: Companies developing digital infrastructure or services

regional.title: Regional Subsidies
regional.description: French regions also offer subsidies to support IT and digital projects. Eligibility criteria and amounts vary by region, but these subsidies can provide valuable assistance.
regional.eligibility: Companies based in the relevant region

horizonEurope.title: Horizon Europe Program
horizonEurope.description: Horizon Europe is the European Union's framework program for research and innovation. It offers funding for research and innovation projects in various fields including IT (information technology) and ICT (communication).
horizonEurope.eligibility: Companies of all sizes, universities, research centers, international consortia
horizonEurope.fundingAmount: Variable depending on the call for projects

digitalTransition.title: Digital Transition Support
digitalTransition.description: Various forms of support are available to assist SMEs in their digital transition, such as France Num Vouchers (a fixed grant to finance expenses related to companies' digital transformation) and digital diagnostics (support for conducting audits and assessments of your digital needs).
digitalTransition.fundingAmount: Up to â‚¬500 for France Num Vouchers

privateFunding.title: Bank Loans and Private Financing
privateFunding.description: In addition to public aid, companies can also turn to bank loans and private financing to support their IT projects. Many banks and financial institutions offer financing solutions tailored to the needs of technology companies.
privateFunding.fundingAmount: Variable depending on the institution and project
